importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date of the news publication indicates the most recent update on the incident involving Doug Martin's death, providing context on when the public learned of the event.
The date of Doug Martin's NFL draft selection highlights a pivotal moment in his career, establishing his prominence in professional football history.
The year in which Martin achieved first-team All-Pro status and Pro Bowl selection underscores a peak in his performance, showing his excellence during a specific season.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: This timeframe covers Martin's most productive years in the NFL, demonstrating his peak performance and legacy as a key contributor to the Tampa Bay Buccaneers' success.
This timeframe captures the events of the incident, including the arrest and death, which are central to the news story and public discourse on police interactions with individuals.

keyTakeAways: Doug Martin, a former NFL running back and All-Pro, died after being detained by Oakland police during an investigation into a home break-in.
Martin was involved in a brief struggle with officers, which led to him becoming unresponsive and later dying in hospital.
The incident has sparked public concern about police conduct and the use of force during arrests, especially involving individuals with a history of public prominence.
Martin was a top 50 player in Tampa Bay Buccaneers history and had a significant impact on the franchise, including being selected to the Pro Bowl and named first-team All-Pro.
His family has requested privacy, and officials, including Oakland Mayor Barbara Lee and the Buccaneers, have expressed condolences.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Doug Martin, a former NFL star and All-Pro running back with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, died after a brief struggle with Oakland police during an investigation into a home break-in. The incident occurred on Saturday, October 18, 2025, and he was transported to a hospital where he later died, though the exact cause of death remains undetermined. Martin, a 36-year-old former first-round draft pick from Boise State, was recognized for his on-field achievements, including two Pro Bowl selections and being named first-team All-Pro. The event has prompted public concern over police conduct and the use of force, particularly involving high-profile individuals. Local officials, including Oakland Mayor Barbara Lee and the Buccaneers organization, have expressed condolences, while Martin’s family has requested privacy. An autopsy is scheduled to determine the cause of death, and the Oakland Police Department has not disclosed further details about the nature of the struggle.
title: Former NFL Player Doug Martin Dies After Struggle With Police During Detention
